name: Deconstruct Spell
text: You deconstruct a spell into its constituent glyphs, storing them to replenish your crystalline dust.
prerequisites: Improved Counterspell or ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic, aphorite, crystalline dust racial trait.
benefit: Once per day when you successfully counterspell or dispel a spell, you can instead deconstruct the spell to regain a number of rounds of your crystalline dust racial trait equal to half the level of the spell.
